name: BookShop
description: After learning fundamentals of PHP I decided to implement all my knowledge in one project. Now I'm studying OOP in PHP so this project I will code using functional PHP. Main idea of this project- to use on practice all I've learned on [Udemy](https://udemy.com), [Linda](https://linda.com), [Treehouse](https://teamtreehouse.com), [Ntschool](https://ntschool.ru) and others.
